website_summaries.verdict: These pads come in a variety of sizes for different-sized pups.
pros: Comes in a variety of sizes
Treated with an additive designed to attract your dog when nature calls
Quick-drying outer layer keeps dog from tracking his mess
Works for training puppies or helping senior dogs with accidents
cons: Pads leaks underneath if your dog urinates near the edge

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!!  NO SMELL!!  SO EASY!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried another brand on my puppy 14+ years ago. He would use it and then shred it. I bought small bathroom mats (no rubber backing) and put it on plastic kennel tray and have been washing pee pads ever since. Tried this brand and can’t believe how FABULOUS they are. No smell at all. Fold and put in plastic bag for disposal. Easy as that! No more years of washing smelly and heavy pee pads from now on! His tray is in my bedroom but you would never know it. So glad I found this brand. 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: I will never bother testing another type of potty pad because these things are amazing and I'm just gonna stick with what works. My dog is old and just makes a big puddle in her sleep most nights but because of these pads I'm not even mad when she does it. There isn't much to say except that everything this product claims it does is absolutely true. Bonus info: I worked at a pet store for 4 years and still get a discount even after quitting but I still order these online from Amazon because the pack of 100 is still cheaper than it ever will be in stores. Call me a traitor
customer_reviews.author: Chani

customer_reviews.title: MORE ABSORBENT?????
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these many times before. The manufacture claims they are 25% more absorbent - more like 25% less absorbent. They even look smaller. I have to see if I have any stashed from previous purchases to check size. I am considering using newspaper in the future, it's cheaper, and the news is not worth reading anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Try these. You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: These pads are great. I've tried many others and somehow there is always run-off onto my floor. Not with these. At first, I was unhappy with the number of folds in the pads but quickly learned that they make that used pad pick up so much easier: just fold on a pre-existing crease and you're done. No wet hands, no drips
customer_reviews.author: Sophia1525

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the other pads.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these 7 times according to my history. We always loved them. BUT this box is completely different. They are cheap and thin. Nothing like the previous ones. I wish I knew what happened. The first pic are the ones I used to get. The 2nd pic are the last ones I received.
customer_reviews.author: acutabove

customer_reviews.title: Good pee pads
customer_reviews.text: Plan on buying these again. They pick up more urine that the brand I buy at the store and the prices on here are good. My dog seems to like these better than the old ones too. All in all it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: A good quality pad that easily absorbs multiple uses by our 11 lbs, Toy Fox Terrier puppy when he's unable to get outside, or home alone. We've used this brand for many months and have zero complaints- the attracting agent in them also ensures "target accuracy" when our dog needs to use them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NSBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: NOT ABSORANT
customer_reviews.text: I have bought different kinds of Pee Pads. Just trying to find a good level of absorbency. This product is the worst. It is so hard to tell from advertising, pictures and even reviews. This product is thin - thin layer of plastic, thin layer of tissue. I have to pile up 2-3 pads to keep the floor dry. I have two Yorkies so the amount of pee is small. ---- Don't waste your money ------
customer_reviews.author: P Phipps

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT leak proof as claimed.
customer_reviews.text: DEFINITELY NOT leak proof. I have the pee dripping all over the floor when I have to pick it up to throw it in the garbage and the floor is soaked. I tried doubling it up and that works for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A

customer_reviews.title: These work great, but now my little 16-year-old Chihuahua has passed ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great, but now my little 16-year-old Chihuahua has passed away, and these days it's hard to find a replacement pet who doesn't cost a fortune.There are a lot of very large dogs up for adoption but my bad back can't handle that much dog. Need another 5-pounder.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Barb

customer_reviews.title: they changed the pads
customer_reviews.text: it has been harder to get the pee pee pads like they use to make the think ones with the littke dimonds on them now ther bigger dimonds on them and thinner and you get pee on your floor please go back to the pld fashion ones
customer_reviews.author: jacksonbetty

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These pads absorb my dogs urine with no leakage. Compared to the pads from Wal Mart, Go Here Brand, that I had been using they are much better, both in absorbing the urine and they are larger also. I purchased this product after Wal Marts in my area stopped carrying the Go Here Brand. The price is a little higher but the quality of the product makes the few dollars per one hundred pads well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C Larry Watson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: well just ordered my second one. I have seven small house dogs all go out but 2 very small ones. I have a very old female maltese who does not go out , just pee pads. adopted a rescue three month old long hair chichuaca. was having trouble with his potty traing on pads. so I tried these ,there is something that attracts the dog to use these!!!! GREAT!!! HE STARTED using them the day we got them. I'm a happy mama , hes not in trouble!!!!lol. these are great. wish they were a little thicker but boy do they woek!!!.
customer_reviews.author: katt

customer_reviews.title: These are the best dog pads I've purchased compared to amazon basics and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dog pads I've purchased compared to amazon basics and other brands. These pads are thick enough where it will soak up the pee and there won't be a lingering smell compared to the amazon basics one. However, the prices for these are a bit high. I bought them when they were going for $20 for 100 and now they're around $32 or more.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Dog uses it just fine. Maybe loves a little too much as she likes to sit on it.... eye roll.
customer_reviews.author: Stephani B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for years and they are excellent. My 2 Chihuahaus both used them for the first 2 years of "Puppyhood" and one still uses them in a litter pan in bad weather. The other guy won't go indoors anymore under any circumstances, and he is 4 years old. The product is very absorbant. We tried using them in a holder, but the dogs pull the pads out for some reason only they know. This same item at Pet co is more than double this price for the 100 pack in the store and more than 10 dollars more on their website.
customer_reviews.author: BobL

customer_reviews.title: Good puppy training aid.
customer_reviews.text: good product stays flat on the floor where you put it. Unless your dog wants to run through the house with it clamped in her tiny teeth.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dangerfield

customer_reviews.title: Good Absorbency Pads
customer_reviews.text: I got a puppy last week and bought the 14 pack on Amazon to try puppy pad training. Overall the pads are very absorbant and my puppy has peed on a single pad around 4 times without any leakage. The only concern I have with the pad is that it is a bit flimsy so it will shift around easily. I have a miniature schnauzer puppy and the pad is just right for him. You may want to get a larger pad if you have a large breed dog. My puppy is not extremely attracted to peeing or pooing on the pad, but the pad does do its job when he does decide to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shiberu

customer_reviews.title: Too thin, pee leaks on my wood floor every time.
customer_reviews.text: Too thin that pee leaks to my wood floor. Have to double up. Good only for my chorkie's poop. I will revert to buying the more expensive brand which turned out to be a lot more economical to use.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Good and Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Prefer these over any others and while we can't take our dog out until he is fully vaccinated I don't have much choice but to use pads. I will say that these are a really good price. You could find 30 pads for the same price as these for 100. They absorb and don't leak. But I suggest getting a pad holder if your pup likes to carry them off, which mine does.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: No leakage through the pad. Floor is protected.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, no leakage through the pad, odor control. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great absorbent pads!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these pads now 3x as I have not been disappointed once. I do put two next to each other since my puppy isn't always the best at getting the one pad but will leave them down for her to use a few times so I don't feel like i'm going through them. They are very absorbent. Our dog is only 10 pounds but our neighbors dog will use them sometimes and she is 20 pounds. The pads still hold her pee quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable for spoiled puppies
customer_reviews.text: So, I have to admit that my dogs are spoiled. They do not do rain, they do not do snow. I do not deal with indoor accidents well. So for my love for dogs to not come with resentment, I have resorted to puppy pads. I have tried many brands, and they all left so much to be desired. Then I found Wee-wee pads by Four Paws. They do not leak. They save my floors. They keep me at peace with my dogs. It is a win, win situation!
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: The do the job.
customer_reviews.text: well boxed, Easy to lay out. Approved by my Yorkie, "Mindy"
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kaye

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to train him to use this pads and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an older small dog who just cant always make it through the night with out an accident. It was easy to train him to use this pads and they are saving the life of my carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Imperiale

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these puppy pads
customer_reviews.text: With all the heavy snow we have been having this winter, it was a challenge for our little Shih Tzu dog going outside. So we decided to try these puppy pads. I started by putting her on the puppy pad every hour on the hour until she went. And if she had an accident, I immediately put her back on the pad. It took about a week for her to get the idea. She is now puppy pad trained and these pads have been working out excellent.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I am very sensitive to smells. These pads really help with odor. I use for 7lb senior MinPin.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Urine soak-through at times
customer_reviews.text: These pads are mediocre. They do absorb urine and most of its odor, and they do protect your floor from inside poops, but regularly the urine soaks through the pad and leaves urine moisture on the floor. My dog prefers this brand over Nature's Miracle or Martha Stewart's versions. Decent price. As long as you know that at times, you'll have to clean up your floor using an anti-bacterial product, go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: These are great training pads. They are thin but actually hold quite a bit, it just takes a bit for it to soak in which can lead to a little tracking which is the only minor downside I find with this product. The price is the cheapest I have found anywhere and I really hope it stays that way. Will continue to buy as long as the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I have a FIVE pound yorky, If this is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a FIVE pound yorky, If this is used by him in the morning when we get up the unine SEEPS THROUGH! If it is just through the day it is ok, but if he overlaps the same spot it goes through the pad. I don't know how this could work for larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Souza

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent & great size for a small dog!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my toy poodle! She has been trained on it since I got her as a as a puppy for my birthday 2 yrs ago-she never has an accident cause this pad is thick & absorbent! I always buy this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen L. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: A bit thin and not like the package states
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 100 pack bag, as the price was decent. These are cheap looking and feeling compared to other wee wee pads I have purchased. I'm actually not using these for a dog, but as a liner in a chinchilla cage to protect my chinchilla's feet. For that, these work fine and they were worth the money. For a dog who has a lot of accidents or is still in training, I would recommend something else though.
customer_reviews.author: Charlemagne 🐇Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Best training pad
customer_reviews.text: They don't leak. Reminds me of a very thin diaper, having 3 small inside dogs they work. No mess just pick up and throw it in the trash. A must for my house.
customer_reviews.author: S Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Very Absorbant
customer_reviews.text: These pads work. Great for puppy potty training. Only problem is my puppies were chewing holes in every clean pad I put down. They were tearing them up. Had to switch to reusable, washable pads. Now using these disposable pads for various things. Glad to have them on hand!
customer_reviews.author: StarrHers

customer_reviews.title: She does her business on these pads with no leakage.
customer_reviews.text: My pupper uses the bathroom on these with accuracy and they don't leak. I have had other products that leak - this one does not. The floor is dry on removal and the scent attracts her to going. This is the only pee pad that we use now - I trust it! Place this pad on tile or something non-carpet to prevent confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Capture Your Pet's Poop and Pee the Easy Way
customer_reviews.text: This is the best all-around solution for catching doggie leavings. The pads are extra absorbent and easily fold and unfold with no mess or fuss. We've shopped around and these are by far the best even though they are priced low. We order them by the bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Roy Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for price.  Wished they would absorb more rapidly.
customer_reviews.text: Stay flat. One good point: they do not leak, Just wish they were a little more absorbent, but all in all a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AnnAnnAnn

customer_reviews.title: Best Pee Pads for the money
customer_reviews.text: What to say.... good size, absorbent, and no leaking (off edges or underneath). I have tried many brands for my 11 year old MinPin, Petie, but these are the best. Petie can't make it a whole 'work' day anymore without peeing and the pads offer the relief spot he needs for that mid-day pit stop while I am at work.
customer_reviews.author: persimmonsmile

customer_reviews.title: Worked until pup outgrew them
customer_reviews.text: These worked for a little while until our pup figured out it was more fun to chew them up and make a huge mess :) Our pup was potty trained quickly and so we didn't get through the entire pack but we were able to give them to our friend who just got a puppy and she said they worked very well for her also.
customer_reviews.author: chan2043

customer_reviews.title: best brand I have found
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 small dogs who use these and they work great...Better than more expensive brands. No leaks....They are quite absorbent. (For big dogs, I would suggest a larger size pad) My puppy, who is now 1 1/2, used these immediately. With the winter we have had I was glad, because she is so small I wouldn't put her out in that weather...she uses the pad by the back door constantly.
customer_reviews.author: valann

customer_reviews.title: when your pooch gotta go
customer_reviews.text: cheap, bulk product, sole job is to catch dog urine and fece, works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Gnuechtel

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: They don't leak, they lock in urine so no tracking occurs, you can use them several times. They even lock in on the edges which for some reason my puppy fines to be the best place to pee and poo sometimes. Durable for destructive pups like mine. She tries to rip them up in the crate, but they out last her destructive moments which in its self is amazing to me.
customer_reviews.author: DDB

customer_reviews.title: Durable and leak free
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many pads. This is the best quality I have come across. It's pretty durable and I would say leak free. This will be my third purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for us! He just shredded the paper apart and still prefers to go on the carpet :-( Looked like tissues all over the place
customer_reviews.author: The Barbs

customer_reviews.title: Not just for puppies
customer_reviews.text: Always having these on hand is great. I have a pug and sometimes I don't hear that she wants to go outside in the middle of the night. So she is also paper trained and knows to go find her pee pad. Also makes me feel more comfortable in hotels as well. i know she won't go on the carpet but will go on her pee pad.
customer_reviews.author: catwrangler

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This wee wee pads are awesome and hold pee well.
customer_reviews.author: Sylwia Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small dog and I use these so he doesn't have to go outside. They're absorbent and well made. I'll be a repeat customer for sure. The pricing is a huge bonus
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. New puppy is paper trained already in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: SBgal

customer_reviews.title: Won't protect your floors
customer_reviews.text: These puppy pads were a good price but a poor value. If your puppy uses it don't leave it down, the urine will seep right through to the floor. I had much better luck with the Natures Miracle brand. My puppy could use it several times before I had to pick it up to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Maltese
customer_reviews.text: Our Maltese uses these when he can't get outside for some reason. Even in a strange environment (hotel, cabin, visiting friends), he will preferentially go to these when we put them out. Saves a lot of cleanup. They are so easy to use and dispose when soiled.
customer_reviews.author: E. Eugene Byrd, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It works really great on preventing the urine to pass on to the floor or getting it damp
customer_reviews.text: i have a westi ( terrier ) and i have to say it really holds his urine , very rare has the urine leaked on to the actual floor and if it did it was because he had a lot i mean a lot of urine . Really pleased comparing it with a cheaper brand.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: best quality puppy pads available.  Fit for professional kennel use.
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue kennel. I use puppy papers on a large scale, and have tried many brands. These are the best you can buy, high quality, durable, and keep the mess where it needs to be...on the paper. No body likes to clean up puppy messes. This product makes the mess an easy clean up and protects the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Workscwell
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. But they have the scent of urine that im sure in supposed to attract the dogs and thats why they work so well. Just dont care for that smell.
customer_reviews.author: TjaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So so product
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty small and also leak when you pick them up. They also have lots of moisture under the pad and the floor is still damp.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than off-brands
customer_reviews.text: We have a housebroken 9 lb Maltipoo that occasionally uses a pee pad. I ordered an off-brand and was so dissatisfied that I threw most of the pads away and ordered the genuine thing: Wee-Wee Pads. The off-brand wasn't think enough nor was it big enough.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Lawver

customer_reviews.title: I keep returning to this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands, but keep coming back to this one. It doesn't leak beyond the borders and is a reasonable size. It works great for my little dogs when I can't take them outside. I buy it on sale and it lasts quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie O

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good product
customer_reviews.text: No, this is not the best, most absorbent product, but if you have a house bound dog and use many each week; this price is best for the quality you will receive. I personally like Nature's Miracle best, but it is way too expensive for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: KL Mackay

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every pad on the market (I think), and this pad is outstanding. They are quilted so the filler does not bunch up. They are bigger than the pan that it sits on, so that when you place the cover over the bottom tray, the pad stays in place. My puppy always tries to dig everything up, but this is a problem for him. Everyone should try them. The price is great also!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Fink

customer_reviews.title: I want my refund
customer_reviews.text: Pad arrive stained and dirty !! the spots are brown and are all over the pad Horrible Disappointment total
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best I've found!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought different pads over the years and these work the best for me. Others are usually lightweight and the dogs bunch them up. These are heavier so they stay put better. I try other brands, but always regret it and I come back to these.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are FANTASTIC! They hold so much! which is great for a multi dog house. We have two smaller dogs that sometimes can't wait for everyone to get home. Now if I could just figure out why the cats like to eat the dry ones life would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fusilier

customer_reviews.title: Great product, stay away from the newer version.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product. They have a newer version that is supposed to be 25% more absorbent. Not so, this older version is so much more absorbent. New version is made flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Arlene J Collins

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Better than any other brand you can find.
customer_reviews.author: cacdavis

customer_reviews.title: holds lots and is waterproof bottom
customer_reviews.text: These are great! they hold lots of urine and it's waterproof so that your floors don't end up wet. My dog goes on it and I don't worry about my floor anymore.
customer_reviews.author: C. Casado

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good potty pad
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good potty pads. I happen to prefer the Arm & Hammer ones a little better because of the size/shape I can buy. If this size is fine for you, then these should make you happy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Velez

customer_reviews.title: Great puppy pee pads
customer_reviews.text: These are thick and don't leak. We tried cheaper ones, but the pads were so flimsy, they were useless. I have not had a leakage problem at all and there's very little odor. I am sticking with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this same thing in box . It was very good quality . However, this time I bought this 100-pack bag version. Each piece of wee-wee pad is so thin that the pee would leak and it looks different from the box version . I am not recommending the bag version of wee-wee pad. It looks fake .
customer_reviews.author: Ziqiao Xing

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppies
customer_reviews.text: Great for puppy training. My puppy was able to learn quick in these compare to other brands
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Marroquin

customer_reviews.title: Great Pads
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these pads for several years for my yorkies, They are quilted and my girls like them . Some pads I have used are not as absorbant as these I will continue to use these pads formy Girls
customer_reviews.author: Mudder

customer_reviews.title: Got pads?
customer_reviews.text: I have to use a lot, but they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great puppy pad.
customer_reviews.text: I don't get the poor reviews. My maltese love to pee on the corner of any wee wee pad and it drives me crazy! These pads really do absorb well and they are leakproof! I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: aMiamiRN

customer_reviews.title: These pads were a lifesaver. When our dog became ...
customer_reviews.text: These pads were a lifesaver. When our dog became ill and couldn’t control her bladder is filled in to help save my carpet. They were an absolute lifesaver for my floor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand so far, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite pads for my 2 chihuahuas. They seem to withhold urine for longer periods of time without wetting my floors unlike the many other brands I have tried. The only downside is that they are expensive so I can’t always buy them.
customer_reviews.author: D Moon

customer_reviews.title: for a new puppy or sick little dog or if the weather is frightful out...this is perfect for your pet indoors. temporary solution
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small little dog and the weather is frightful out or the dog is not feeling well.
customer_reviews.author: a fellow seer

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pads don't seem to be as absorbent as the ones I bought at Pet Smart. But cheaper, which is great! And I didn't have to haul them into the cart, into the car, into the house, love curbside delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Joy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: 100 pads for @ $20 is fantastic! Pretty sure I'll never buy these at a store again. I was worried that these would be super cheap quality but they're identical to the ones I've been buying.
customer_reviews.author: mamma bear4

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Is ok. My 3 month Yorkie puppy bites it all the time don't know what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible,  but will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Folded to the size of a napkin. Not nearly as thick or absorbant as the ones I bought at PetSmart, but half the price. Keep mine in a holder, which is why i hate the fact it is folded so much in the packaging. I wouldn't put it on the bare floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Pads
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of different brand puppy pads. These are the best we have 3 dogs & will not go outside when it rains. These work great and no dripping when you go to change the pads. They work in the smell too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer from Calif

customer_reviews.title: Great pads at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these pads because all of the stores discontinued the pads that worked best for our dog. To buy these at the major pet store would cost almost 20$ more than we paid. Delivery was fast and our little dog has a place to potty late at night and while we are away.
customer_reviews.author: JBINDY

customer_reviews.title: Terrific leak-proof product for my 14 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year old terrier x poodle is sometimes home for long stretches of time and I created an area for him to relieve himself when I can't get there to take him out. I put down several layers of these pads but was pleasantly surprised to find that even his large bladder-emptying events are all neatly contained in one pad with no leaking through to the next layer. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding, don't leak
customer_reviews.text: We use piddle pads for our tiny dogs and these are one of the very best brands. They really work great and never leak. Just ordered more and we definitely recommend them. Price and shipping are also super.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: poor folding
customer_reviews.text: When the pads arrived they were folded into smaller portions. As a result, the edges curled up. If my puppy was slightly off the pad the urine would soak the underneath portion. Poorly folded. I can only use the absorbent side to wipe up where the wetness underneath. The pad itself seems fine but I can't get the creases out to have them lay properly no the floor. Useless and lots of additional work.
customer_reviews.author: patricia wenger

customer_reviews.title: theese pds r nice lil expensive but very nicely made and does exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: theese pds r nice lil expensive but very nicely made and does exactly what it said it would, love them , just wish they would come down in price abit!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: thin, not leaky but felt like it could
customer_reviews.text: the size was good, providing for a big target for the puppy. however, the pads just felt a bit thin and not as absorbent. i was always worried that it might leak and thus had to change it more often than other pads i've used
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Cute print
customer_reviews.text: Love the print on the back of it (has cat and dog driving on the beach). Puppy pad works for my pup.
customer_reviews.author: justine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price put nothing special, can purchase on sale at local places
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: & They Wee-Wee'd All Over the Home
customer_reviews.text: Too lazy to go to the pet store. Fulfilled my need for pee pads... Not for me - for the pups... lol
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Puppy wee pads
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these in the store but this was a really good price and came quickly. I was nearly out and was glad I didn't have to run to the store in the winter weather we've been having!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine A.

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly for our aging cat!
customer_reviews.text: These have worked out perfectly - we have a 16 year old cat who is loosing bowel control. He was wetting his bed every night, but now we use these on top of his bad and it saves lots of laundry
customer_reviews.author: DebWarden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Until this order, we have found wee-wee pads to be the best choice on the market -- saving us lots of roll off cleanups. For some reason this batch is not doing the job. Make me wonder if the good price is because these are a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: critic

customer_reviews.title: Best wee-wee pads around!
customer_reviews.text: Very absorbent and the price is right on amazon.com. Have purchased multiple times and this will always be my go to brand. Highly recommend. No accidents or leakage from these pads.
customer_reviews.author: Greek goddess

customer_reviews.title: Solid pads
customer_reviews.text: These are good value for the money, far cheaper than buying in pet stores. I only wish they had adhesive on the corners like some brands I've purchased before. We just tape them down instead. Work fine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Howells

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT pads that are very able to absorb large old dog urine. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tee McAllister-Tilma

customer_reviews.title: Great value just not sure why 150 ct isn't reasonable anymore it was easier to purchase less frequently
customer_reviews.text: Great value just not sure why 150 ct isn't reasonable anymore it was easier to purchase less frequently. But ths isn't bad
customer_reviews.author: Lori Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Great for little dog
customer_reviews.text: Have been using WeeWee pads since I brought my dog home, these are great. The only thing, my dog needs two. He will not mix his business, #1 goes on one pad #2 goes on another. Oh well :)
customer_reviews.author: Alex Y

customer_reviews.title: nice pads
customer_reviews.text: Much better than other pads I have purchased. This product has great quality and consistency. The size fits the pad holder much better than the ones sold at Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Normally pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what was wrong with this batch - had a musty smell that I never encountered before. Use them for my cats around the litter box to keep messes to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Ceruleanverde

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the ones I have always used in the past and this was not what I expected. The pads are too small and an odd shape. They work, but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: sigmond

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These puppy pads are just what I'd been buying at the store and paying much more for. The pads work and we've had no accidents
customer_reviews.author: DJK

product_meta.title: Four Paws Disposable Pee Pads
product_meta.description: Size:Standard 22" x 23"| Color:Original (Puppy): 22.5” x 23”Four Paws has been providing the finest-quality products that simplify pet parenting and keep fur friends happy, healthy, and clean for more than 40 years. From the creators of America's Original Trusted Pads, Wee-Wee Superior Performance Pads are 25 percent more absorbent than original 5-layer Wee-Wee Pads. These dog potty training pads are designed with the Floor Armor Leak-Proof System, featuring 6 innovative layers for unparalleled floor protection. With a tear-resistant top layer, absorbent polymer that turns liquid into gel, and a leak-proof bottom layer to keep floors dry, just one pad offers 24 hour protection—guaranteed. All Wee-Wee dog pee pads also include targeted attractant to draw your dog to the pad and prevent potty training accidents elsewhere. Whether you need puppy training pads or simply a comfortable indoor potty spot for your best friend, each dog pad measures 22 inches x 23 inches and is ideal for fur friends of all sizes.
feature_bullets: EVEN MORE ABSORBENT - These pee pads for dogs are 25 percent more absorbent than original 5-layer Wee-Wee Pads, keeping floors dry and cleanup easy
6-LAYER LEAK-PROOF TECHNOLOGY - Exclusive Floor Armor Leak-Proof System draws fluid to the core and quickly locks in moisture to prevent messy tracking
24-HOUR PROTECTION GUARANTEED - Use just one of these dog potty pads for all-day performance—no need to stack pads!
TARGETED ATTRACTANT - Built-in attractant continuously draws dogs to the pad to make dog potty training easier and reduce the risk of accidents
FOR DOGS OF ALL SIZES - Each dog pee pad is 22 inches x 23 inches

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
